settings.promise_item_description: Have an occasion? Have a particular taste or color in mind? Trying to stay within budget? Our vast selection boasts many options that will surely fit your needs.

Artisanally crafted locally, each piece of Aura chocolates is kept in temperature-controlled locations. You’re ensured a luscious experience every time. (did you notice that we’re always wearing a sweater?)
Don’t be shy to ask! You want a picture of your order? Need someone to write a personalized note? We are here to make your gift-giving experience an absolute pleasure.

settings.promise_description: There is a reason we have established a strong following in Montreal and all over the world for our beloved Kosher artisanal Belgium chocolates.

settings.allowed_title: It All Started When My Mom Allowed Me In Her Kitchen.
settings.allowed_description: Delicious homemade treats and entertaining were always on the agenda in my childhood home. My mom, a party planner par excellence with a discerning taste for gourmet food graciously let me be at her side while preparing for her parties. It was these adventures that developed my interest in creating a gourmet product with my favorite dessert-chocolate.

settings.instagram_description: Check us out on instagram, we love to see our follower base grow! We constantly work on showing you our latest chocolate trends.. come check us out!
